txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have seen dark clouds on the horizon and I fear a storm is coming to Bree-land. I've heard tell that you're a Mariner of some skill. If that is so, I have a task for you. If you are interested, come and meet with me at the Prancing Pony in Bree-town.

Barliman Butterbur

'May I help you with something?'

You hand Barliman Butterbur the letter he sent you, and he squints at it for a moment.

'I sent this, did I? Oh, yes, yes, of course! You're the Mariner that Nob told me about. Well, I have a job for you, if you're interested!'
You received a letter from Barliman Butterbur, the proprietor of the Prancing Pony in Bree-town.
Bring the letter to Barliman Butterbur in the Prancing Pony
Barliman Butterbur sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Prancing Pony.\n\nDeliver the letter to Barliman Butterbur. He can be found in the Prancing Pony in Bree-town.
